meanings.sent1: Warsaw is a beautiful city with rich history.
meanings.sent2: I visited Warsaw last summer and enjoyed exploring its streets.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ghost go to Warsaw? To visit the haunted castle!
meanings.sent4: In the heart of Warsaw, the spirit of resilience echoes through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of Warsaw's architecture left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: A type of breed of domestic pigeon.
meanings.sent1: The Warsaw pigeon has unique markings on its feathers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a Warsaw pigeon perched on the fence in the park.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Warsaw pigeon challenge the crow to a race? To prove it's the fastest flyer around!
meanings.sent4: The Warsaw pigeon soared gracefully through the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The gentle cooing of the Warsaw pigeon added a peaceful soundtrack to the garden.
